entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, a boy who has been punished for letting a snake escape.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin and the leader of a gang that bullies Harry.

entities.name: piers
entities.description: Piers is one of Dudley's friends in his gang.

entities.name: dennis
entities.description: Dennis is another member of Dudley's gang.

entities.name: malcolm
entities.description: Malcolm is a part of Dudley's group of friends.

entities.name: gordon
entities.description: Gordon is one of the members in Dudley's gang.

entities.name: mrs figg
entities.description: Mrs Figg is an elderly woman who was knocked down by Dudley on his bike.

relationships.description: Dudley and his gang bully Harry, who is the target of their harassment.
Piers is one of Dudley's friends in his gang.
Dennis is another member of Dudley's group of friends.
Malcolm is a part of Dudley's gang.
Gordon is one of the members in Dudley's group of friends.
